thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com | 6 of 110
thread.title: Shelby Pierson

author: Shelby Pierson
title: Shelby Pierson
text: I love ezCater because they are very through with their service. They promptly call if there are any issues with your order and are always will to find replacements if needed. They help you communicate with the restaurants when needed. They always send updates when orders are on track. I use ezCater at least three times a week when ordering for our satellite offices around the country. They're a great company and I highly recommend using their services!!
